name: Little Light (ShinoDev)
description:
It is an unfinished Project from many months ago. Currently there is no plan on working more on this Game.

Controls:
Controls are a bit different tbh. 

You have to first Pick up a weapon to add it to your collection, then u need to equip it through your collection. 

Pick up Weapon: E

Weapon Collection: Tab

Reload : RightClick

Shoot: LeftClick

Dash: Shift

Jump : Space.

Like i said. i dont work on this project anymore. But when u like it, leave a comment down below, maybe i can revive it.
